import { Component, Inject,OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { style } from '@angular/animations'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fetch-data', templateUrl: './fetch-data.component.html', styleUrls: ['../../assets/modal.css'], }) export class FetchDataComponent { public forecasts: WeatherForecast[] = []; campo: string = ''; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'api/departamento').subscribe(result => { this.forecasts = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } onSubmit(): void { if (this.campo.trim()) { console.log("asddasdsa") } } modalOpen = false; openModal(): void { this.modalOpen = true; } closeModal(): void { this.modalOpen = false; } } interface WeatherForecast { claveDepartamento: number; descripcion: string; }
